vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
προκῡρόομαι,
passive, to be ratified or confirmed before, ἐν τῷ -κεκυρωμένῳ ψαφίσματι [Refs 2nd c.BC+]; διαθήκη -κεκυρωμένη ὑπὸ τοῦ εοῦ [NT]:—middle, [Refs]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to establish previously, ratify beforehand
to sanction and establish previously, ratify and confirm before, Gal. 3:17*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 事先設立, 預先認證 (加 3:17)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 事先设立, 预先认证 (加 3:17)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: kết lập từ trước; phê chuẩn từ trước. πρό (G4253) + κυρόω (G2964)
